title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 353: Featuring Robin Lehner
description:
On Episode 353 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by Robin Lehner of the Vegas Golden Knights. Robin joined (1:19:49) to discuss playing in Vegas, fast food, mental health and tons more. The guys also discuss the Jack Eichel situation in Buffalo. Kirill Kaprizov got himself paid, so the boys dive into that deal and a few other contract that were signed last week. The guys wrap up with some TV talk and whit dives into the Ryder Cup.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
